supply.supply_status: Good - Division preparing for offensive operations with improved supply base access from Egyptian infrastructure. Ammunition: 14 days (offensive operations planned), Fuel: 8 days for limited motorization, Water critical at 4.5L/person/day for desert conditions (80,100L total daily requirement for 17,800 personnel), Food: 21 days. Supply base: Mersa Matruh with road connections to Alexandria. 16th British Brigade attachment (September 9) increased logistical requirements by ~20%.
